text: We are looking for assistance  with a backend integration in HubSpot CMS for a custom made page with table with filters and results , any suggestion freelancer are welcome

Hi All!  :wave:

Poka inc. is looking for an experienced Marketing Operations Specialist (HubSpot). The candidate would be working remotely, preferably from Eastern US.

:rocket: If you've never heard of Poka, we build a SaaS application that empowers factory workers to learn, solve problems and collaborate continuously. 

Introduction to Poka: <https://bit.ly/3vaVLG5>

Apply today! We want to e-meet you. :point_down:

<https://poka.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=102>
Hi - looking for a developer to transition our marketing website from wordpress to HubSpot. Here is the current website <https://sparechange.fund/>. Please DM me if interested .
Aside from the super talented people here, we also have this for users who have projects to complete: <https://www.HubSpotmatch.com/>
Hi <@U02HNPD2B61> in which language are developed your page? send me a DM :+1:

For any HubSpot developers currently located in the Netherlands, we are hiring: <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/teun-rutten-500a2b90_javascript-nodejs-developer-activity-6854490176211697665-Ool6|https://www.linkedin.com/posts/teun-rutten-500a2b90_javascript-nodejs-developer-activity-6854490176211697665-Ool6>
